description: Draws composite rectangular grid for educational visualization.
example_usage:
# Example usage for draw_composite_rectangular_grid
result = draw_composite_rectangular_grid(data)

educational_standards.description: Recognize area as an additive property.
Solve mathematical problems involving perimeters of polygons.
Exhibit rectangles with the same area and different perimeters.

educational_standards.display_name: Area, Perimeter and Side Length Word Problems
educational_standards.description: Solve word problems involving area, perimeter, and side length.
